mapper.select: SELECT QPS.PLNT_CD , PTYP.DTL_NM AS PITM_TYP_NM , QPI.PITM_NM , QPI.PITM_EN , QPI.CRG_DPT_CD , SD.DPT_NM AS CRG_DPT_NM , QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.PITM_CD , QPS.PITM_VER , QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD , SDPROC.DTL_NM AS SPEC_PROC_NM , QPS.DEL_YN , QPS.USE_VER_YN , QPS.RVS_NO , QPS.DOC_NO , QPS.RVS_DT , QPS.ENFO_DT , QPS.RVS_REA_CD , QPS.RVS_CTT , QPS.RVS_DIV_PS , QPS.REVW_UID , SU1.USER_NM AS REVW_UNM , QPS.REVW_DS , QPS.REVW_IP , QPS.PITM_ANS_SPEC_APR_IDX , SU2.USER_NM AS RJT_UNM , QPS.RJT_UID , QPS.RJT_DS , QPS.RJT_REA , QPAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPAS.AITM_SPEC_VER FROM QM_PITM_SPEC QPS LEFT JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QP.PITM_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPS.PITM_VER AND QP.USE_VER_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QPI.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QPI.PITM_CD = QPS.PITM_CD AND QPI.PITM_VER = QPS.PITM_VER LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_AITM_SPEC QPAS ON QPS.PLNT_CD = QPAS.PLNT_CD AND QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = QPAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL SDPROC ON QPS.PLNT_CD = SDPROC.PLNT_CD AND QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD = SDPROC.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_CD_DTL PTYP ON QPI.PLNT_CD = PTYP.PLNT_CD AND QPI.PITM_TYP = PTYP.DTL_CD LEFT JOIN SY_DPT SD ON SD.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QPI.CRG_DPT_CD = SD.DPT_CD LEFT JOIN SY_APR_INFO SAI ON QP.PLNT_CD = SAI.PLNT_CD AND SAI.APR_IDX = QPS.PITM_ANS_SPEC_APR_IDX LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU1 ON QPS.REVW_UID = SU1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU2 ON QPS.RJT_UID = SU2.USER_ID WHERE QPS.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPS.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QPS.SPEC_PROC_CD = #{specProcCd} AND SAI.APR_UID = #{loginUserUid}

SELECT QPSA.PLNT_CD , QPSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPSA.AITM_SEQ , QPSA.ANS_DPT_CD , QPSA.AMITM_CD , M.AITM_KN , MA.VRIA_NO , MA.VRIA_KN , QPSA.AITM_ORD , QPSA.PERSPEC_TXT , QPSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , QPSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , QPSA.SPEC_TYP , QPSA.JDG_TYP , QPSA.PER_SLV_LOW , QPSA.PER_SLV_UPP , QPSA.PER_SLV_DESC , QPSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , QPSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , QPSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , QPSA.SLV_JDG_CFM , QPSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , QPSA.RST_UNIT_CD , QPSA.RST_DPNT , QPSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , QPSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , QPSA.RPT_PRT_YN , QPSA.ISP_DPT_CD , QPSA.SMP_CLLT_QTY , QPSA.SMP_CLLT_UNIT , QPSA.ISP_DUR_TM , QPSA.EQM_USE_TM , QPSA.MKR_QTY , QPSA.AITM_RMK FROM QM_PITM_SPEC_AITM QPSA LEFT JOIN MS_AMITM MA ON QPSA.AMITM_CD = MA.AMITM_CD LEFT JOIN MS_AITM M ON SUBSTR(QPSA.AMITM_CD, 0, 6) = M.AITM_CD WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx}
